	VStack{

	VStack{

.background(Color(red:255.0, green:255.0, blue: 0.0))

} 
} 
} 
Text("sol sol text") 
.background(Color(red:0.0, green:255.0, blue: 255.0))
} 

.background(Color(red:0.0, green:0.0, blue: 0.0))

	VStack{

	HStack{
Text("sol sag sol text") 
.background(Color(red:255.0, green:165.0, blue: 0.0))
.frame(width:  100, height:  120)

.foregroundColor(Color(red:255.0, green:165.0, blue: 0.0))

.frame(width:  100, height:  120)

.background(Color(red:255.0, green:165.0, blue: 0.0))
}
